name: Feud
description: Two prominent families are engaged in a bitter feud that threatens to tear the community apart.

criticalSuccess.msg: You broker a lasting peace and the families become allies. The unity strengthens your kingdom.

success.msg: You successfully mediate the dispute and restore peace.

failure.msg: Your mediation fails. The feud escalates and spreads to their supporters.

criticalFailure.msg: Your intervention makes things worse! Violence erupts in the streets.

modifierTemplate.name: Ongoing Feud
modifierTemplate.description: The feuding families continue their conflict, disrupting trade and causing civil unrest

onResolution.successMsg: The feud has been settled and peace restored!
onResolution.failureMsg: The families remain at each other's throats

escalatedModifier.name: Blood Feud
escalatedModifier.description: The feud has turned violent with regular bloodshed in the streets
